overrides.analysis-process:
## Steps
1. Use git-diff-lines to capture numbered changes
2. Open full file only when needed
3. Anchor comments to exact lines
overrides.focus-areas:
## Find
- Inconsistencies (naming, patterns, error handling)
- Missing related changes
- Security issues
- Style violations
- Good practices (praise)
overrides.guidelines:
## Guidelines
- Anchor issues to lines when possible
- Omit suggestion for praise; include for others
- Only include confident suggestions
- Skip files with no issues

changes.rationale: Kept concise header position near top for fast model focus.
Optional section removed to reduce prompt length for fast model.
Shortened title to front-load task succinctly.
Kept required placeholder intact for clarity.
Optional content dropped to minimize overhead.
Locked constraint retained verbatim and moved earlier for priority.
Simplified steps into terse imperatives for fast model.
Tightened bullets to reduce words while keeping scope.
Already concise and clear for command limits.
Locked schema preserved exactly and placed earlier for emphasis.
Line-number rule kept as-is for accuracy.
Condensed bullets for fast model while preserving constraints.
